actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize Escambia County Florida, to convey certain lands in Florida to a political subdivision of the State of Florida, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes Escambia County, Florida, to convey certain lands to a political subdivision of the State of Florida. (Currently, such lands may be conveyed by the County only by lease or to the Federal Government, the State of Florida, or a State agency.)

titles.title: A bill to authorize Escambia County Florida, to convey certain lands in Florida to a political subdivision of the State of Florida, and for other purposes.
